title: Cursed Magic
description: A Paranormal Reverse Harem Romance In the age-old war of good versus evil, where does the Daughter of Darkness and Chaos belong? Serena Stollmeyer is sent to the Academy of Light to steal the first of three godly relics. She’s told to infiltrate, locate, steal, and get out. It’s not a hard job, right? Only Serena discovers that in order to get close to the relic, she has to get close to four sinfully sexy men. She didn’t mean to actually like them, and she definitely didn’t mean to fall head over heels in lust with them. When Serena’s secrets are revealed, the truth doesn’t set her free. Not only does she now have to worry about preserving the relationship with her men, she also has to worry about preserving her place at the academy. Because failure means the death of all she holds dear, including herself. **This is a NA Paranormal Reverse Harem (RH) Academy Romance. Slow Burn**
author: Charlie   Daniels
